Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Deemos stops.

"Wait, we won't go to the Predacon base, we go to the field =
and call Psuedo on commlink! He'll come when he learns that Doom Ice is her=
e." Deemos said He walked toward a field. His group followed him as usual.
=

OOC: Hey, everyone, got any good names for Deemos' group? I'd love to hear=
 your suggestions and may use one! Send them to me through private mail, so=
 that it doesn't clog up the RPG!...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=
: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 23, =
2000 4:09 PM
  Subject: Re: The un-named group...


  Infectra



  *Infect=
ra follows Deemos and his group*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 200=
0 4:45 AM
    Subject: The un-named group...


    Deemos laughs.

    "Don=
't worry Infectra, with you with us, we have 9, that combined with the othe=
r Maximals and the Preds and Alliance will fall!" Deemos said.

    "We hav=
e no Maximal leader, Deemos." Blender said.

    "Maybe I should run for le=
ader if there isn't a leader." Deemos said. (He doesn't know aboutIron Rapt=
or) He thought about the mission.

    "Let's go!" Deemos said. He walks to=
ward the Predacon base. His group of 7, still un-named, follow him...
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 2:04 AM
      Subject=
: Re: Airbomber...


      Infectra



      *Infectra looks at Airbomber*
=


      Infectra: "I'm afraid I'm going to get slagged just like that. and =
no one get mad. I'm not doubting any of you. But, there is a chance we coul=
d end up out numbered tough. You probably think I'm being silly and dumb."
=


      *Infectra says to Airbomber*

        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wedne=
sday, August 23, 2000 1:05 AM
        Subject: Airbomber...


        Airbo=
mber seen the fear in Infectra's eyes.

        "Why are you afraid?" Airbo=
mber asked her...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: i=
lovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday=
, August 23, 2000 12:25 AM
          Subject: Re: Doom Ice...


          I=
nfectra


          *Infectra frowns. She really didn't know anything about=
 this or what to do but her heart took gained force over her brain where sh=
e only thought about her love for Airbomber and didn't want to lose him. Sh=
e slowly walks over feeling a bit scared but raises her hands in air with t=
he others but still felt scared*

            ----- Original Message ----- =

            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
 Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:05 AM
            Subject: Doom Ice...=



            A satsis pod falls in front of the Maximals base. At the sam=
e time, Deemos and his group are repaired and come from the CR Chamber, the=
ir wounds were fatal but not major. The 6 of them sport a different paint j=
ob, all 6 of them are purple, black, and white now. Deemos and his group go=
 outside and see the pod. Deemos gives the thumbs up to His comrades. They =
start to program it.

            "Name?" Deemos asked.

            "It sa=
ys the name is...Tint." Rizopas says. Deemos's smile is huge.

            =
"Make the name Doom Ice, you can do that, if she was dumb enough to escape =
in a stasis pod, we reprogram her!" Deemos said.

            "Isn't that w=
hat we are against?" Artist asked.

            "No, Artist, it's not, we a=
re just trying to make more bots good!" Deemos replied. Airbomber walks up =
and sees the pod.

            "What are you guys doing with the pod?" He a=
sked. Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members had a blaster stuck in A=
irbomber's face.

            "I say we kill him!" Blender said.

         =
   "I say we make him join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

            "For=
 once your intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweating now=
, he didn't know what that meant but it scared him. Deemos came up from beh=
ind him. (Don't know if Infectra is there, but I assume she is, if she's no=
t then tell me) Stronghold and Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts to pu=
mp some phony info into his mind with the device, and bam! He already looks=
 serious.

            "Infectra, you might as well leave." Deemos said.

 =
           "I will join you, you guys are right, we do need less violence, =
the war must end, and if there must be a war to end the war, so be it!" Air=
bomber said. He turns back to Infectra.

            "Do not worry, Infectr=
a, I still love you, you don't have to leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laugh=
ed and rubbed his hands together as Rizopas reprograms Tint and makes her D=
oom Ice. Doom Ice is first seen now, she stands and looks around. Deemos is=
 in a new form, but she reconizes him. But, she has no fear, he seems diffe=
rent. She knew of their war, she didn't know how, but she knew. (Reprogramm=
ed and memory addage while she was asleep)

            "I shall join you."=
 Doom Ice said. Deemos looked at his growing group, A few more and he'll ru=
le the Neo Beast Wars! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had 8 now, and it =
felt pretty good. Doom Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single bit, and reme=
mbered Deemos as your lord and almighty leader.

            "For the Maxim=
als, and everyone's protection and peace! Until all...are one!" Deemos shou=
ted. Doom Ice and Airbomber's hands were raised and the 8 of them raised th=
eir hands high in the air. Airbomber waved for Infectra to do it to, not ca=
ring about what she thought of this group...
